properties.areaDesc: Natrona County Lower Elevations; Casper Mountain
properties.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 12 at 12:30PM MST by NWS Riverton WY
properties.description:
A quick moving winter weather system will track across the area
today. A few inches of snowfall is expected.

* WHAT...Another inch or so of snow for a snow total of 4 inches,
along with a total of 5 to 6 inches on Casper Mountain, as well as
in the western portion of the county including Highland.

* WHERE...Natrona County including Casper and Casper Mountain.

* WHEN...This afternoon.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Light snow of flurries will continue tonight.

NWSheadline: Snow to continue for the rest of the afternoon
